name: @scramjet/runner
description: This package is part of Scramjet Transform Hub. The package executes the remote runners and provides communication with them through abstraction layer provided by adapters.

scripts.build:docker: docker build -t scramjetorg/runner:$(git rev-parse HEAD) -f Dockerfile ../../
scripts.test:docker: docker run -i --name runner -v prerunner-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD):/package scramjetorg/runner:$(git rev-parse HEAD)
scripts.clean:docker: docker rm -f runner; docker volume rm prerunner-$(git rev-parse HEAD)

author: Scramjet <opensource@scramjet.org>
